description:
Great to have on hand for occasional use. Not too heavy, this basic pulley works for hauling and fixing on glaciers or walls.

  • Swing walls for mid-rope access
  • Brass bushings and nylon sheave aren't the most efficient, but you can't beat the price
  • Breaking strength of 20kN, working load of 5kN
  • Fits ropes up to 12mm diameter
  • CE certified
name: Camp Andry Mobile Pulley
